title: "Fire separation" means the distance in meters measured from any other building on the site or from another site, or from the opposite side of a street or other public space to the building
clause_text: "Fire separation" means the distance in meters measured from any other building on the site or from another site, or from the opposite side of a street or other public space to the building.

source_pdf.text_snippet: "Fire separation" means the distance in meters measured from any other building on the site or from another site, or from the opposite side of a street or other public space to the building.
